mapper.insert: INSERT INTO novel (title, uid, lid, introduction, info, score, state, create_time, update_time, word_num, click_num, recommend_num, chapter_num, cover, recent_chapter_id, allow) VALUES (#{title}, #{uid}, #{lid}, #{introduction}, #{info}, #{score}, #{state}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{wordNum}, #{clickNum}, #{recommendNum}, #{chapterNum}, #{cover}, #{recentChapterId}, #{allow})
mapper.select: SELECT novel.nid, novel.title, novel.introduction, novel.info, novel.score, novel.collect_num, novel.state, novel.create_time, novel.update_time, novel.word_num, novel.click_num, novel.recommend_num, novel.chapter_num, novel.cover, novel.recent_chapter_id, novel.level, user.username, user.uid, label.*, chapter.cid, chapter.chapter_name FROM novel LEFT JOIN label ON novel.lid = label.lid LEFT JOIN user ON novel.uid = user.uid LEFT JOIN chapter ON novel.recent_chapter_id = chapter.cid WHERE novel.nid = #{nid}
